com.music.player.lib.view

类 MusicViewPager.SimpleOnPageChangeListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.music.player.lib.view.MusicViewPager.SimpleOnPageChangeListener
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MusicViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
    封闭类:
    MusicViewPager

    public static class MusicViewPager.SimpleOnPageChangeListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements MusicViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
    Simple implementation of the MusicViewPager.OnPageChangeListener interface with stub implementations of each method. Extend this if you do not intend to override every method of MusicViewPager.OnPageChangeListener.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器

      This method will be invoked when the current page is scrolled, either as part of a programmatically initiated smooth scroll or a user initiated touch scroll.

      Called when the scroll state changes.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onPageScrolled

        public void onPageScrolled(int position,
                           float positionOffset,
                           int positionOffsetPixels)
        从接口复制的说明: MusicViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
        This method will be invoked when the current page is scrolled, either as part of a programmatically initiated smooth scroll or a user initiated touch scroll.
        指定者:
        onPageScrolled 在接口中 MusicViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
        参数:
        position - Position index of the first page currently being displayed. Page position+1 will be visible if positionOffset is nonzero.
        positionOffset - Value from [0, 1) indicating the offset from the page at position.
        positionOffsetPixels - Value in pixels indicating the offset from position.

      • onPageSelected

        public void onPageSelected(int position)
        从接口复制的说明: MusicViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
        This method will be invoked when a new page becomes selected. Animation is not necessarily complete.
        指定者:
        onPageSelected 在接口中 MusicViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
        参数:
        position - Position index of the new selected page.

      • onPageScrollStateChanged

        public void onPageScrollStateChanged(int state)
        从接口复制的说明: MusicViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
        Called when the scroll state changes. Useful for discovering when the user begins dragging, when the pager is automatically settling to the current page, or when it is fully stopped/idle.
        指定者:
        onPageScrollStateChanged 在接口中 MusicViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
        参数:
        state - The new scroll state.
        另请参阅:
        MusicViewPager.SCROLL_STATE_IDLE, MusicViewPager.SCROLL_STATE_DRAGGING, MusicViewPager.SCROLL_STATE_SETTLING
